metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44733 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A use-after-free exists in drivers/tee/tee_shm.c in the TEE subsystem in the Linux kernel through 5.15.11. This occurs because of a race condition in tee_shm_get_from_id during an attempt to free a shared memory object.
